verbose_text: In short, a three-month, randomized, double-blind, positive drug controlled observational study showed that imrecoxib 0.4 g/d was not inferior to celecoxib 0.4 g/d in the control of symptoms of axSpA, reducing inflammation and disease activities, improving mobility function, and other disease aspects.
evidence: imrecoxib 0.4 g/d was not inferior to celecoxib 0.4 g/d in the control of symptoms of axSpA, reducing inflammation
